excerpt: Tank commander Humphrey Bogart leads a hopelessly outnumbered group of Allied stragglers defending a remote well from a German battalion in the North African desert.
title: Sahara

excerpt: Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin fight over a chunk of stolen money and a riverboat casino in 1870s Galveston.
title: 4 for Texas

excerpt: Cary Grant plays matchmaker when a housing shortage forces him, an American athlete, and a young woman to share a Tokyo apartment during the 1964 Olympics.
title: Walk Don't Run

excerpt: Penniless producer George Murphy schemes to avoid eviction from his posh hotel penthouse and conscript playwright Frank Sinatra into his new show.
title: Step Lively

excerpt: Jason Voorhees gets a gritty makeover and hunts photogenic twenty-somethings around Crystal Lake.
title: Friday the 13th
